page.title: 10Whitehall Fruit Farm, Gatton
page.content: There are twelve people working on Whitehall Fruit Farm. The{vehicles they use include strawberry planters and combine harvesters. For the rats in the fields they use rat poison. In the farm they use cats like in normal houses for the mice. To keep the birds away they use scatterguns. The trouble is as soon as the noise dies away the birds come back again! They water the plants every few days for about an hour,to make sure the water soaks in. The people who farm don't choose their{employment,}it's a sort of family job. There are no particular times of work in farming, but they work more in the summer. Most of the fruit they grow goes to the shops. The bad fruit they have to throw away. The land is chalky. The most popular fruit is strawberries.
